sentence.Network_en: Chromatophore A name generally applied to a pigment - bearing structure, usually a membrane lamella or vesicle.
sentence.Network_cn: 承载色素的结构, 通常是细胞膜的薄层或小泡.

sentence.Network_en: Based on lithography technology , the electrochemical lamella machining ( ECLM ) by frequency group pulses was experimentally studied.

sentence.Network_en: Such fibers may have lamella superstructure and the paraffin oil exists in the interlamellar region.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种部分结晶的弹性纤维可能具有平行排列的片晶结构,石蜡油存在于片晶之间.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 他认为蝴蝶结构色所展现的虹彩现象是由于其鳞片微纳结构中构成纵脊(ridges)的多层薄层(lamella)所产生的薄膜干涉造成的,这些薄层构成的多层膜结构就是一种天然的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from Latin, diminutive of lamina 'thin plate'

means.word_mean: 1. any of the radiating leaflike spore-producing structures on the underside of the cap of a mushroom or similar fungus
2. a thin membrane that is one of the calcified layers that form bones
